Services

Delivering first-class products to our clients is what we do. Our team of experienced professionals will help you achieve your business goals through our user focused design and development methodology.

Mobile Apps

User focused mobile apps are our specialty. AppHammer does not settle for so-so apps--we produce amazing mobile experiences for our customers. Our hybrid mobile app development philosophy delivers a consistent, experience across all platforms and devices.

Data Applications

To a business like yours, data is everything! We can help you harness the power of data by designing data solutions that support business goals. Analytics, migration, database design, web application integration, warehousing...we’ve got you covered.

Digital Strategy

You have a great business, we know that, but here is the thing, no one will know about your business unless you have a solid digital marketing strategy. Over 90% of all online experiences start with a web search. 75% of users never scroll past the first page of search results. Without a solid strategy your company is lost in the shuffle. AppHammer builds proven digital strategies incorporating content strategy tactics, SEO, email and social marketing, A/B testing, pay-per-click advertising and analytics. You need an expert to navigate these tricky waters, AppHammer is your lifeboat.

Products

Apphammer is busy developing the next generation of mobile apps and software products to make our clients better. Out problem solving approach helps build clean, thoughtful solutions to complex business dilemmas.

Schedole

Let’s face it, coordinating room schedules is a headache. Finding and booking an open meeting room is a pain too. Schedole | shed-o-lay | is an all-in-one room scheduling system that makes life easier. We combine our powerful scheduling system that connects to your Exchange calendars with a digital sign solution allowing users to browse and book meeting rooms right at the door! If it is open, you can book it with Schedole.

Remote Lab

A student focused online lab solution that grants remote access to specialized software. Students connect from their pc, mac or mobile device to access software as if they were sitting in an on-campus computer lab. Remote lab is revolutionizing the online learning environment.
